visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a stock chart with the following specifications: Chart type: 'stockChart', Chart title: 'AAPL Stock Price', Axes and labels styling: Use the 'dark-unica' theme with custom font sizes and colors for labels and titles, Data series: Fetch data from 'https://demo-live-data.highcharts.com/aapl-c.json' for the 'AAPL' series, Custom colors: Use the default theme colors, Additional configurations: Include range selector with default selection, styled mode enabled, and chart dimensions set to a height of 400px and a width between 310px and 600px.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a stock chart with the specified settings. The chart type is set to 'stockChart', which is suitable for displaying time series data like stock prices. The title of the chart is 'AAPL Stock Price', styled with a white color and a font size of 18px. The axes labels and titles are styled with a light gray color and a font size of 12px for labels, and 14px for the y-axis title. The data for the 'AAPL' series is expected to be fetched from the provided URL and will be displayed with two decimal places in the tooltip. The chart is set to use the 'dark-unica' theme, which is imported via CSS, and the styled mode is enabled to ensure that the chart respects the theme's styling. The chart dimensions are set to a height of 400px and a width between 310px and 600px, ensuring it fits well within the container div. The range selector is included with a default selection, allowing users to easily navigate through different time ranges.
